row.process:
:set &recording# = 0 :SET &fullcontrol# = "0" :SET &read# = "0" :SET &write# = "0" :SET &execute# = "0" :SET &length# = STR_LENGTH("&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# ") :SET &UC4RB_USER_NAME# = SYS_ACT_USERID() :PRINT "USERNAME: &UC4RB_USER_NAME#"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#)
: SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# ") : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &recording# = 1 : ENDIF : IF &recording# = 1 : SET &userPos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "&UC4RB_USER_NAME#") : IF &userPos# > 0 : SET &startIndex# = STR_FIND(&line#, ":",&userPos#) : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&startIndex#) : SET &fullcontrol# = STR_FIND(&line#, "(F)") : SET &read# = STR_FIND(&line#, "(R)") : SET &write# = STR_FIND(&line#, "(W)") : SET &execute# = STR_FIND(&line#, "(RX)") : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:IF &read# <> "0" : SET &read# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &write# <> "0" : SET &write# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &execute# <> "0" : SET &execute# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &fullcontrol# <> "0" : SET &read# = "1" : SET &write# = "1" : SET &execute# = "1" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_READ# = &read# :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_WRITE# = &write# :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_EXECUTE# = &execute# :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "NONE" : SET &retcode# = 0 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "ALL" : IF &fullcontrol# <> "0" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "READ" : IF &read# <> "0" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "WRITE" : IF &write# <> "0" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "EXECUTE" : IF &execute# <> "0" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF
